analysis.description:
VeloxToken._getStakingReward (/unique_contracts/0xc52217c326237c63cb56892bd081e2d1dc826f37.sol#212-220) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- coinAge <= 0 (/unique_contracts/0xc52217c326237c63cb56892bd081e2d1dc826f37.sol#217-218)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= STAKE_START_TIME) (/unique_contracts/0xc52217c326237c63cb56892bd081e2d1dc826f37.sol#214)

VeloxToken._getCoinAge (/unique_contracts/0xc52217c326237c63cb56892bd081e2d1dc826f37.sol#220-232) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- _now < uint256(transferIns[_address][i].time).add(STAKE_MIN_AGE) (/unique_contracts/0xc52217c326237c63cb56892bd081e2d1dc826f37.sol#223-228)
